attributes.action: Ask the Archbishop of Canterbury, Dr Rowan Williams, to resign his position as head of the Church of England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Archbishop of Canterbury has recommended that Sharia Law be recognised in the U.K. as a legitimate parallel system of justice. Sharia Law is brutal, oppressive and is fundamentally opposed to the basic idea of freedom cherished by many British subjects.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
